description: From Middle English empoisounen, impoisounen, from Old French empoisoner, equivalent to em- +â€Ž poison.

verbs.description: empoison (third-person singular simple present empoisons, present participle empoisoning, simple past and past participle empoisoned)

examples: She, with sweet words and false enticing smiles, / Infused love among the dainties set, / And with empoison'd cups our souls beguiles, / And made each knight himself and God forget.
